title: New: The Delphines – Panic / Uptown Lover (Demo)
body:
Wow, check out this sexy, rumbling bassline from Milwaukee outfit **The Delphines**.

Slightly grungey beach-pop, _Panic_ is too slick for words, landing somewhere between **The Kills** and **Best Coast**, with it’s blissed out attitude and seductive approach. So the B-side follows a fairly similar formula and sounds slightly like a sixteen year old’s first attempt at recording, but hey, why try to fix something that ain’t broken, right? **The Delphines** are bloody brilliant, and more people should know it.
